name: Thunderbolt of Zeus
printed_effect:
The Empowered Elestral gets +2 {attack}.
When the Empowered Elestral destroys an
opponent’s Elestral in battle that opponent
must Expend {omni}. If Zeus is Enchanted, that
opponent must Expend {omni}{omni} instead.
effect: The Empowered Elestral gets +2 {attack}. When the Empowered Elestral destroys an opponent's Elestral in battle that opponent must Expend {omni}. If Zeus is Enchanted that opponent must Expend {omni}{omni} instead.
